title: Roast Beef Summer Rolls
description: Vietnamese summer rolls are often filled with or shrimp, but Grace Parisi makes hers with roast beef from the deli. Currently not available!

title: Corn carrot pork bone soup 玉米胡萝卜排骨老火靓汤
description: Tasty sweet corn carrot soup is a classic and common Cantonese soup.

title: Tomato Egg soup 西红柿鸡蛋汤
description: 很有营养的汤！classic Chinese soup, Bowls of tomato egg drop soup are commonly seen on tables in Chinese households, especially in the summertime when tomatoes are plentiful.

title: Mint and Pea Soup
description: Mint gives this soup a wonderfully fresh taste, and it makes a perfect lunch with some bread and cheese on the side. Currently not available!

title: CANTONESE STEAMED FISH 清蒸鲈鱼
description: Cantonese steamed fish is a traditional, simple dish often served as one of the final courses in a Chinese wedding banquet. 非常好吃！

title: CHINESE BRAISED FISH (HONG SHAO YU) 红烧鲈鱼
description: A Chinese New Year is not a New Year without fish, and you MUST have two of them: one for New Year’s Eve and one for Chinese New Year’s Day. That’s why, on the eve of Chinese New Year, we’re posting this Chinese Braised Fish (red cooked fish), or hong shao yu recipe for all of you!. 红烧也是不错的。

title: Salmon Yakitori
description: A soy sauce, mirin, and brown sugar glaze caramelizes on the fish and baby bok choy as it grills, and also serves as a dipping sauce. But again, we don't have it unfortunately:(

title: 炒生菜
description: 蒜蓉炒生菜，好吃又营养！

title: Romaine Lettuce
description: 你想生吃的也可。但我觉得炒一下会好吃点。

title: Choco pie
description: A choco pie is a snack cake consisting of two small round layers of cake with marshmallow filling and a chocolate covering. The term originated in America but is now also used widely in South Korea, Japan, and its exports, and many other countries as either a brand name or a generic term. Names for similar confections in other places include chocolate marshmallow pie.
